resources.string: By Kaitlynn, Lakshay, Sami, and Yangyang

Link: https://opencoursehub.cs.sfu.ca/bfraser/grav-cms/cmpt276/home
 The objective of the game is to match all the fruits/vegetables in the least amount of time.
1 . Initially the two cards are empty and then each card is populated with three objects.
2 . Both cards share one common object.
3 . Once you click the common object, two new cards appear.
4 . This process is reaped untill the game gets over.
5 . Overall time required to complete the game is stored and the top 5 times can be viewed in the High score section.
